Kay on the rails

What is your new year's resolution ?

19 Feb 2007

someone : What's your new year's resolution ?
Hannal : Current resolution is 1280x800. I hope I will take 1920x1080 this year. 1280x800 is a too narrow resolution.

깔깔깔깔.

- 참고 : New year's resolution #2 by Goodhyun (제대로 웃긴 새해 소원 이루어지시길 굳현님 by doubletrack)
